ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Referral source: Friend or relative
Notes: 0= Unchecked; 1= Checked

ElementDescription: Referral source: Study staff
Notes: 0= Unchecked; 1= Checked

ElementDescription: Referral source: Referral from health care provider
Notes: 0= Unchecked; 1= Checked

ElementDescription: Referral source: Newspaper or magazine
Notes: 0= Unchecked; 1= Checked

ElementDescription: Referral source: brochure
Referral source: Poster or flier
Notes: 0= Unchecked; 1= Checked

ElementDescription: Referral source: Mailing
Notes: 0= Unchecked; 1= Checked

ElementDescription: Referral source: website
Referral source: Radio
Notes: 0= Unchecked; 1= Checked

ElementDescription: Referral source: Television
Notes: 0= Unchecked; 1= Checked

ElementDescription: Referral source: other referral source
Referral source: specify
Have you consumed at least one alcoholic beverage in the past 5 years?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: In the past 6 months, how many drinks containing alcohol have you consumed on average during a week?
Have you consumed 6 or more alcoholic beverages on one or more occasions in the last 6 months?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Are you willing to not drink for about 6 years OR to drink an alcoholic beverage a day for about 6 years?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: (WOMEN ONLY) Are you post-menopausal (at least 12 months without menstruation)?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Are you currently participating in another intervention study?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Do you have plans to move out of the area in the next 2 years?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Do you have reliable transportation to the clinic?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Date of verbal consent to be screened
Notes: MM/DD/YYYY

ElementDescription: Time of verbal consent to be screened
Notes: HH:MM AM/PM

ElementDescription: Was the participant referred by a provider, nurse, or care coordinator?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Was permission obtained from a provider, nurse, or care coordinator to approach the adolescent?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Date provider gave permission to approach adolescent
Notes: MM/DD/YYYY

ElementDescription: Was a PHQ-9 score collected at this visit?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Is your child currently being seen by the embedded mental health therapist at your office?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes (eligible)

ElementDescription: Are you and your child interested and willing to be seen by the embedded mental health therapist at your office?
Notes: 0= No (ineligible); 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Do I have your permission to contact your doctor's office to help facilitate scheduling that appointment?
Notes: 0= No (ineligible); 1= Yes (eligible)

ElementDescription: Was the parent provided the information for T2C and did they confirm that they received the first text?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Was the child provided the information for T2C and did they confirm that they received the first text?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Was the child provided the information to download the BritePath App and able to download?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Was the Nurelm Advanced Report available?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Date Nurelm Advanced Report available
Notes: MM/DD/YYYY

ElementDescription: Was mental health treatment recommended in the Nurelm Advanced Report?
Notes: 0= No (ineligible); 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Would you be interested in screening for the Text2Conect study?
Notes: 0= No (ineligible); 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Visit name
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2

ElementDescription: Site
Notes: Study Site

ElementDescription: Respondent: Other (specify)
Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Screening Type
Notes: 1= Phone; 2= In Person; 3= Letter/Referral

ElementDescription: Did parent consent for adolescent to be screened?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Reason parent did not consent for adolescent to be screened
Notes: 1= Not interested; 2= Time constraint; 3= Interview too long; 4= No phone or reliable access to phone; 5= Communication or other language barrier; 99= Other

ElementDescription: Reason parent did not consent for adolescent to be screened - Other, specify
Did adolescent consent to be screened?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Reason adolescent did not consent to be screened
Notes: 1= Not interested; 2= Time constraint; 3= Interview too long; 4= No phone or reliable access to phone; 5= Communication or other language barrier; 6= Spoke to parent on phone (continue, still eligible) 99= Other

ElementDescription: Reason adolescent did not consent to be screened - Other, specify

ElementDescription: Select all the substances (if any) that you have taken at any time today (in the past 24 hours): Alcohol
Notes: 1=Indicates that participant endorsed having alcohol in the past twenty-four hours; 0=Indicates that participant did not endorse having alcohol in the past twenty-four hours

ElementDescription: Please select all the substances (if any) that you have had in the last 2 hours. Caffeine
Notes: 0=Indicates that participant did not endorse having caffeine in the past two hours; 1=Indicates that participant endorsed having caffeine in the past two hours

ElementDescription: Select all the substances (if any) that you have taken at any time today (in the past 24 hours): Drugs
Notes: 1=Indicates that participant endorsed having other drugs (excluding alcohol) in the past twenty-four hours; 0=Indicates that participant did not endorse having other drugs (excluding alcohol) in the past twenty-four hours

ElementDescription: Select all the substances (if any) that you have taken at any time today (in the past 24 hours): None
Notes: 1=Indicates that participant indicated that they have not had any substances in the past twenty-four hours; 0=Indicates that participant did not select this option.

ElementDescription: Select all the substances (if any) that you have taken at any time today (in the past 24 hours): Prefer not to answer
Notes: 1=Indicates participant indicated that they prefer not to answer this question; 0=Indicates that participant did not select this option.

ElementDescription: You indicated that you consumed alcohol in the past 24 hours. How much alcohol did you consume?
Notes: Open-ended short text response that appears if participant indicates on substances_24hr_alcohol that they consumed alcohol in the past 24hrs.

ElementDescription: Approximately what time did you consume alcohol?
Notes: Open-ended short text response that appears if participant indicates on substances_24hr_alcohol that they consumed alcohol in the past 24hrs.

ElementDescription: You indicated that you took other drugs in the past 24 hours. Which other drugs did you take?
Notes: Open-ended short text response that appears if participant indicates on substances_24hr_drugs that they consumed other drugs in the past 24hrs.

ElementDescription: You indicated that you took other drugs in the past 24 hours. How much did you take of each drug?
Notes: Open-ended short text response that appears if participant indicates on substances_24hr_drugs that they consumed other drugs in the past 24hrs.

ElementDescription: You indicated that you took other drugs in the past 24 hours. Approximately what time did you take each drug?
Notes: Open-ended short text response that appears if participant indicates on substances_24hr_drugs that they consumed other drugs in the past 24hrs.

Notes: 0=Indicates that participant did not endorse having nicotine in the past two hours; 1=Indicates that participant endorsed having nicotine in the past two hours

ElementDescription: You indicated that you engaged in physical exercise in the past 2 hours. How long did you exercise for (in minutes)?

Notes: 0=Not anxious at all; 100=The most anxious; -99=Prefer not to answer
